original_text: And the prince that is among them shall bear upon his shoulder in the twilight, and shall go forth: they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby: he shall cover his face, that he see not the ground with his eyes.
korean_text: 무리가 성벽을 뚫고 행장을 그리로 가지고 나가고 그 중에 왕은 어두울 때에 어깨에 행장을 메고 나가며 눈으로 땅을 보지 아니하려고 자기 얼굴을 가리리라 하라

sentences.original_text: And the prince that is among them
shall bear upon his shoulder in the twilight
sentences.korean_translation: 황혼 시간에 어깨에 짐을 질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: they shall dig through the wall
that he see not the ground with his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 눈으로 땅을 보지 못하게 하기 위해
